column1: Kata Robata////The restaurant didn't look that full
column2: but it was pretty loud. It was difficult talking to my boyfriend because we don't usually talk loudly. The lighting is really dim and we sat near the back
column3: close to the door to their tables outside. Every time that door opened
column4: there was a cold breeze and there was a big party eating back there. I was pretty cold all night due to that.
